pages.text: $(li)The Blossom is a biome composed of Cherry trees and Cherry Leaf Carpets on the ground that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this wet place you can find some vegetation, like Cherry and Birch Trees, Bamboo, Red Lotus Flowers and Lilies of the Valley.
$(li)Some animals like Foxes or Kois can be found here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Blossom$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
